text:
Britney Spears has more than a brutal custody fight with her ex, Kevin Federline, to blame for her recent mood swings, RadarOnline.com has learned.

According to an insider, Spears is "desperate" for Sam Asghari, to propose, "but he’s dragging his feet and stalling."

As RadarOnline.com reported, Spears, 36, immediately turned her attention to tying the knot with her 23-year-old boy toy, Asghari, after she recently wrapped her Las Vegas residency.
title: One More Time? Britney's Family 'Desperately Worried' She'll Have Another Meltdown
